Package edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui

package edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui
This package contains classes that support the construction of text-based user interfaces.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld
     
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui.console
    This package contains the textual user interface for SmallWorld.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui.graphical
    This package contains a simple, text-based graphical user interface for SmallWorld that uses the Java Swing library.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui.parser
    This package contains the logic to "parse" or understand what the user types into the game.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.controller
    This package manipulates the game model in a (nearly) user-interface-agnostic manner.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model
    This package contains several classes that represent the game state, e.g., the game map, items, and the player.
    edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.persistence
    This package's purpose is to create and load game data files.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ParserWorldObserver
    An partial implementation of IParserObserver and IWorldObserver that factors out the common code between graphical and command-line text-based interfaces.
    TextUtilities
    A convenience class of handy constants and methods for working with text.
    WordWrappedMessage
    A class that produces word wrapped string messages.
